name: TowardAnarchy
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
We live in anarchy daily. Every second we make choices to create and destroy to love and hate. We influence the world around us without consideration of, or need for, authority.

Anarchy does not preclude hierarchy or rules, it simply means no ruler to force them on you.
